ComicInfo.Series: The Shadow: The Death of Margo Lane
ComicInfo.Summary:
The stunning conclusion to the first Dynamite series both written and drawn by Matt Wagner. The Shadow faces off with an unexpected threat in the dangerous lair of the Tong overlord, the Red Empress. An epic battle pits the Master of Darkness in a struggle for his very lifeâ€¦one which he dare not win! Eisner Award-winner Matt Wagner returns to both write and draw one of his favorite characters with pulp-inspired coloring by Brennan Wagner.
